result.eng: He boys were wearing short trousers.
result.ga: Bhí brístí gearra ar na buachaillí
result.orig: Bhí brístí gearra ar na buachaillí
result.html: Bhí brístí gearra ar na buachaillíHe boys were wearing short trousers.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí brístí gearra ar na buaċaillíHe boys were wearing short trousers.

result.eng: Anyway, to make a long story short...
result.ga: Cibé ar bith le scéal fada a dhéanamh gairid
result.orig: Cibé ar bith le scéal fada a dhéanamh gairid
result.html: Cibé ar bith le scéal fada a dhéanamh gairidAnyway, to make a long story short...
result.ponchtml: Cibé ar biṫ le scéal fada a ḋéanaṁ gairidAnyway, to make a long story short...

result.eng: They published a collection of short stories.
result.html: D'fhoilsigh siad cnuasach gearrscéaltaThey published a collection of short stories.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟoilsiġ siad cnuasaċ gearrscéaltaThey published a collection of short stories.

result.eng: He has only left behind some short, lame writings.
result.ga: Ní raibh fágtha ina dhiaidh ach roinnt scríbhinní gearra bacacha
result.orig: Ní raibh fágtha ina dhiaidh ach roinnt scríbhinní gearra bacacha
result.html: Ní raibh fágtha ina dhiaidh ach roinnt scríbhinní gearra bacachaHe has only left behind some short, lame writings.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ fágṫa ina ḋiaiḋ aċ roinnt scríḃinní gearra bacaċaHe has only left behind some short, lame writings.

result.html: Scríobh sí abairt ghairidShe wrote a short sentence.
result.ponchtml: Scríoḃ sí abairt ġairidShe wrote a short sentence.

result.html: Scríobh sí nóta gairidShe wrote a short note.
result.ponchtml: Scríoḃ sí nóta gairidShe wrote a short note.

result.html: Tá gruaig ghearr uirthiShe has short hair.
result.ponchtml: Tá gruaig ġearr uirṫiShe has short hair.

result.eng: Everything only lasts for a short time.
result.ga: Ní mhaireann aon ní ach seal
result.orig: Ní mhaireann aon ní ach seal
result.html: Ní mhaireann aon ní ach sealEverything only lasts for a short time.
result.ponchtml: Ní ṁaireann aon ní aċ sealEverything only lasts for a short time.

result.eng: Long as my life may have been, whatever remains of it will be short.
result.ga: Is gairid mo shaol feasta dá fhadacht é
result.orig: Is gairid mo shaol feasta dá fhadacht é
result.html: Is gairid mo shaol feasta dá fhadacht éLong as my life may have been, whatever remains of it will be short.
result.ponchtml: Is gairid mo ẛaol feasta dá ḟadaċt éLong as my life may have been, whatever remains of it will be short.

result.eng: He was so short of sense as a child five years younger than him.
result.ga: Bhí sé chomh gann i gcéill leis an leanbh a bhí cúig bliana ní b'óige ná é
result.orig: Bhí sé chomh gann i gcéill leis an leanbh a bhí cúig bliana ní b'óige ná é
result.html: Bhí sé chomh gann i gcéill leis an leanbh a bhí cúig bliana ní b'óige ná éHe was so short of sense as a child five years younger than him.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ċoṁ gann i gcéill leis an leanḃ a ḃí cúig bliana ní b'óige ná éHe was so short of sense as a child five years younger than him.
